entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:53 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
